Articles.Content:
I eat some instant noodles.

THEY'RE BETTER DRY...

Edited February 17, 2016 by quasarrgames
Blastoise used Water Gun!
Oh, is it a water fight? Well say hello to my little friend.
Mad Rocket Scientist uses pressure washer on your side of the chessboard.
All my pieces use parachutes to get down safely, but while they are still in the air they shoot machine guns at you from above.
A couple of my pieces are hit, but my priest heals them before casting spells of light at your pieces.
I use the mirror of infinite reflectivity and send them back at you.
Having solved the mirror laser puzzle, I position my rooks and queen in the Alekhine Gun formation.
Because they're nice and lined up, I fire a shot with my .22 rifle to try and score a point.

My pieces align in a cone, so that the pawns form a ring at the periphery and the queen at the apex, a la E. E. Smith, so that they can use all their weapons simultaneously. A solid beam of firepower rushes at your pieces.
My pawn dodges the ordnance, and scores a 5-pointer, completing a home-run and positioning itself at the service line for its next 100m sprint round.
Before the starting gun fires, my knight runs up to your pawn. "Tag, you're it!"
My pawn puts it right foot in, it puts it's right foot out, it does the spin smash and your pieces fall all about...
I use a Protoss Arbiter to recall a rook and a knight behind your pawn line. Check!
You're checking? Well I'll raise you to $17,000.
I call your bluff, and raise 300 caps.

Oh bad luck Maximus97, I'm afraid caps is a real number, as in the popular phrase "I only have caps days left to live".

Now I say 70.

That's Numberwang.

69 (-1)

Whoops wrong thread. Wait, what were we talking about again?

...oh no! What have i done?!

D4nk m3m35 1nc0m1ng!!!!!!!!!!!!420no5cop69swagy0L0J0NC3N44444

Edited February 19, 2016 by quasarrgames

Hmm...Waltham...nah, that's not gonna work. How about...hmmm...Abbey Road. On the DLR. That should be good.

Edited February 19, 2016 by cantab
I launch this game into space on my latest rocket design to get things back on track, and simultaneously head towards your pieces.
My king heads the ball clear to the halfway line.

8 minutes ago, cantab said:

My king heads the ball clear to the halfway line.

Ooooh, this thread is gonna be fun;

The Rook breaks out 2 AK-47s and begins shooting at the opposing queen.
My Queen's Bishop casts Mighty Guard, blunting the damage of the bullets and starting to regen health. With the double speed my kingside pawns advance, seeking weaknesses in the opposing position.
One of my pieces goes to the ground, holding its leg and claiming foul. The referee believes him and shows a red card to the offending piece.

Fortunately, the red card is overturned and the piece free to play in the next game.

I propose the addition of a new rule:

6. Any player may during their turn propose either the addition of a new rule or the revocation of an existing one. Other players may endorse or veto the proposal. If the proposal gains two endorsements before it gains any vetos, it is enacted.
